title: PaymentResult
description:
PaymentResult is an XDR Union defines as:

```text union PaymentResult switch (PaymentResultCode code) { case PAYMENT_SUCCESS: void; case PAYMENT_MALFORMED: case PAYMENT_UNDERFUNDED: case PAYMENT_SRC_NO_TRUST: case PAYMENT_SRC_NOT_AUTHORIZED: case PAYMENT_NO_DESTINATION: case PAYMENT_NO_TRUST: case PAYMENT_NOT_AUTHORIZED: case PAYMENT_LINE_FULL: case PAYMENT_NO_ISSUER: void; }; ```
